title: Biodiversity Loss and Land System Change in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Which of the following is an endemic species to Timor-Leste?
What is the primary cause of habitat destruction in Timor-Leste?
Which ecosystem service is provided by mangroves in Timor-Leste?
What is the estimated annual deforestation rate in Timor-Leste as of 2020?
Which of the following is a traditional Timorese conservation practice?
What is the name of Timor-Leste's national park that covers both terrestrial and marine ecosystems?
Which of the following is NOT a level of biodiversity?
What is the primary threat to coral reefs in Timor-Leste?
Which agricultural practice can help mitigate biodiversity loss?
What percentage of Timor-Leste's original forest cover is estimated to have been lost over the past century?
Which of the following is a consequence of mangrove destruction in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary driver of agricultural expansion in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a direct impact of deforestation in Timor-Leste?
What role do endemic species play in Timor-Leste's ecosystems?
choices: They are unimportant to ecosystem function
They represent irreplaceable components of global biodiversity
questions.answer: They represent irreplaceable components of global biodiversity

questions.question: Which of the following is a challenge in managing protected areas in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary benefit of community-based conservation initiatives in Timor-Leste?
Which ecosystem in Timor-Leste is known for its high marine biodiversity?
What is a potential impact of climate change on Timor-Leste's biodiversity?
choices: Altered habitat conditions pushing species beyond tolerance limits
questions.answer: Altered habitat conditions pushing species beyond tolerance limits

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a sustainable agriculture practice mentioned in the module?
What is the significance of Timor-Leste's isolation in terms of biodiversity?
choices: It has led to fewer species
It has contributed to the evolution of unique species
It has made the ecosystem more resilient to change
questions.answer: It has contributed to the evolution of unique species

questions.question: Which of the following is a regulating ecosystem service provided by forests in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary concern with agricultural intensification in Timor-Leste?
choices: Conversion of natural habitats to monocultures
questions.answer: Conversion of natural habitats to monocultures

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential consequence of biodiversity loss in Timor-Leste?
What role do coral reefs play in Timor-Leste's coastal ecosystems?
choices: They serve as nurseries for fish populations
questions.answer: They serve as nurseries for fish populations

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key ecosystem in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary challenge for montane species in Timor-Leste facing climate change?
choices: Limited ability to migrate to more suitable areas
questions.answer: Limited ability to migrate to more suitable areas

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential benefit of ecotourism in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of establishing protected areas in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a threat to Timor-Leste's biodiversity?
What is the significance of traditional ecological knowledge in Timor-Leste's conservation efforts?
choices: It is considered outdated and irrelevant
It helps in understanding and managing local ecosystems
It focuses solely on economic development
questions.answer: It helps in understanding and managing local ecosystems
